ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Worldly Issues & "Play Nice"
ygData.msgSnippet: ... skin? ... Actually it s off a Huge Alligator which is a very rare spawn in Innothule Swamp.  Since Beta 2 I have seen the gator a total of maybe 10
ygData.messageBody:
> > anyone knows? Also btw, does anyone know where to find an alligator
skin?
> > Our druid has looked for weeks in Innouthoule with no luck.
>
> I heard off bull alligators.

Actually it's off a "Huge Alligator" which is a very rare spawn in Innothule
Swamp. Since Beta 2 I have seen the gator a total of maybe 10 times. But I
don't camp/hunt him so he may be slightly more frequent. I did spend 5
hours killing every gator in sight with my ranger once and couldn't get him
to spawn. (Would explain why that skullcap is such a rarely owned quest
item)

Lyrnia Jongleur

PS: I too am trying that quest. I gave up and am waiting until I hit 35 so
I can track. I don't like wasting my Ranger's time tracking down items for
my bard. He doesn't even know her after all.
